name: Touch (Bcoffee)
description:
Hi everybody, I'm Bcoffee.

This is a small game that I developed using a gyroscope, combined with Unity's 2D lighting system and the title of the game with simple color matching.

This game can run on Android phones with gyroscopes, and it can run well on Android12 phones (I use Pixel 6 for testing).

If you have any thoughts or suggestions for the game, please leave a message below to let me know.

When I have more time, I will continue to make the game better.

I hope you like this game.
